tasks.title: Create project directory
tasks.description: Create a new directory for the Eleventy project and navigate into it.
tasks.test: Verify the directory exists and you are inside it.

tasks.title: Initialize npm and create package.json
tasks.description: Run 'npm init -y' to create a package.json file with default values.
tasks.test: Check that package.json exists in the project directory.

tasks.title: Install Eleventy
tasks.description: Install Eleventy as a dev dependency using 'npm install @11ty/eleventy --save-dev'.
tasks.test: Check that Eleventy appears in package.json dependencies and node_modules is created.

tasks.title: Create a basic template file
tasks.description: Create an index.html or index.md file with sample content in the project directory.
tasks.test: Check that the file exists and contains sample content.

tasks.title: Run Eleventy build
tasks.description: Run 'npx @11ty/eleventy' to build the site and generate the _site output folder.
tasks.test: Check that the _site directory is created and contains the built files.

tasks.title: Start Eleventy development server
tasks.description: Run 'npx @11ty/eleventy --serve' to start the local development server with hot reload.
tasks.test: Visit http://localhost:8080/ and verify the site loads and updates on file changes.

tasks.title: Configure Liquid templating
tasks.description: Set up Liquid as the templating engine for the project, ensuring proper file extensions and configurations.
tasks.test: Create a test template with Liquid syntax and verify it renders correctly.

tasks.title: Install Bootstrap
tasks.description: Integrate Bootstrap 5 into the project via CDN in the base layout file.
tasks.test: Verify that Bootstrap styling applies to a test element.

tasks.title: Set up folder structure
tasks.description: Create necessary directories for includes, layouts, pages, posts, assets, and CSS.
tasks.test: Ensure all folders exist and Eleventy recognizes them in the build process.

tasks.title: Install Netlify CLI
tasks.description: Install Netlify CLI as a dev dependency using 'npm install netlify-cli --save-dev'.
tasks.test: Check that Netlify CLI appears in package.json dependencies and can be run with 'npx netlify --version'.

tasks.title: Create base layout
tasks.description: Build a base layout template with header, footer, meta tags, and Bootstrap integration.
tasks.test: Verify the layout renders with proper HTML structure and Bootstrap is loaded.

tasks.title: Style site theme
tasks.description: Create a custom CSS file for theme-specific styling beyond Bootstrap defaults.
tasks.test: Apply custom styles to a test page and verify they override Bootstrap defaults where intended.

tasks.title: Design site header
tasks.description: Create a responsive header with site name (Hashim Warren) and navigation menu.
tasks.test: Verify the header displays correctly and navigation menu works on mobile and desktop.

tasks.title: Add typography styles
tasks.description: Implement consistent typography styles for headings, paragraphs, and other text elements.
tasks.test: Check that typography renders consistently across different browsers.

tasks.title: Implement footer
tasks.description: Create a responsive footer with navigation links, social media icons, and copyright information.
tasks.test: Verify footer displays correctly and all links work.

tasks.title: Create button styles
tasks.description: Design custom button styles for primary and secondary actions throughout the site.
tasks.test: Check that buttons render consistently and have appropriate hover states.

tasks.title: Design card component
tasks.description: Create a reusable card component for blog posts and portfolio projects with consistent styling.
tasks.test: Verify cards display correctly with various content lengths and image ratios.

tasks.title: Implement contact form
tasks.description: Create a contact form with name, email, subject, and message fields that will work with Netlify Forms.
tasks.test: Submit test data and verify form validation works.

tasks.title: Style code blocks
tasks.description: Implement syntax highlighting for code blocks in blog posts.
tasks.test: Verify code blocks render with proper syntax highlighting.

tasks.title: Build homepage layout
tasks.description: Create the homepage with introduction, featured blog posts, and portfolio highlights.
tasks.test: Verify homepage displays correctly on mobile and desktop.

tasks.title: Create About page
tasks.description: Build the About page with professional bio, background, and optional headshot.
tasks.test: Verify the page renders correctly and all content is displayed properly.

tasks.title: Add resume download
tasks.description: Add a downloadable PDF resume to the About page.
tasks.test: Verify the resume downloads correctly when the link is clicked.

tasks.title: Create Posts page
tasks.description: Build the blog listing page that displays all posts in reverse chronological order.
tasks.test: Verify posts display correctly with titles, dates, and excerpts.

tasks.title: Create single post template
tasks.description: Design a template for individual blog post pages with title, date, content, and optional tags.
tasks.test: Verify single post pages render Markdown content correctly.

tasks.title: Create Projects page
tasks.description: Build the portfolio page with project cards showing titles, clients, and brief descriptions.
tasks.test: Verify projects display correctly in a responsive grid layout.

tasks.title: Create single project template
tasks.description: Design a template for individual project pages with detailed information and results.
tasks.test: Verify project details pages display correctly with all content and images.

tasks.title: Create Speaking page
tasks.description: Build a page showcasing speaking engagements, talks, and workshops.
tasks.test: Verify speaking engagements display correctly with dates, titles, and venues.

tasks.title: Create Contact page
tasks.description: Build the contact page with form, email address, and social media links.
tasks.test: Verify contact form displays correctly and all links work.

tasks.title: Configure Content Management
tasks.description: Set up the data structure for blog posts and projects, either as Markdown files or JSON data.
tasks.test: Verify that content can be added and displays correctly throughout the site.

tasks.title: Integrate form submission service
tasks.description: Configure Netlify Forms for the contact and newsletter forms.
tasks.test: Submit test data and verify it is received in the Netlify Forms dashboard.

tasks.title: Test responsive design
tasks.description: Thoroughly test all pages across different screen sizes and devices.
tasks.test: Verify all pages render correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop views.

tasks.title: Add SEO and Performance optimizations
tasks.description: Implement meta tags, optimize images, and ensure fast page load times.
tasks.test: Run Lighthouse tests and verify scores for SEO and performance.

tasks.title: Ensure accessibility compliance
tasks.description: Check all pages for accessibility issues and make necessary adjustments.
tasks.test: Run accessibility audit and verify WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

tasks.title: Deploy to Netlify
tasks.description: Set up Netlify deployment from GitHub repository.
tasks.test: Verify the site deploys correctly and is accessible at the Netlify URL.

tasks.title: Configure custom domain
tasks.description: Set up a custom domain for the site through Netlify.
tasks.test: Verify the site is accessible at the custom domain with HTTPS.
